mobiles.name: kadim peri ejderhasý
mobiles.long_description: Bir peri ejderhasý buralarda kanat çýrpýp yapacak bir þeyler arýyor...
mobiles.description:
It's a cute little multi-colored dragon... About 2 foot long. It
gracefully dances around your head.

mobiles.name: kadim grifon
mobiles.long_description: Büyük kara kanatlý bir grifon saldýrmak için hamle yapýyor.
mobiles.description:
Golden maned and black all over. It's quite a beautiful creature if not
for the fact it is hungry and is attacking you!

extra_descriptions.description: Bu kýrmýzý, baþ döndürücü kokusuyla bir gül.
